name: Long Blue Cloak of Vanaheim
data: It decreases the users strength impressively.
It decreases the users constitution adequately.
It increases the users intelligence ILLEGALLY.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users cold resistance strongly.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'lesser cold invulnerability'.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'greater cold invulnerability'.
It modifies the user's resistance to cold.
